#summary Development Road Map for Mconf-Web

= Current Release =

== Release 0.1 ==

Features:
  * Migration of VCC to Rails 3 ([http://code.google.com/p/mconf/issues/detail?id=9 issue 9])
  * Branding of VCC to become Mconf-Web ([http://code.google.com/p/mconf/issues/detail?id=11 issue 11])
  * First integration of BBB in Mconf-Web using bigbluebutton-api-ruby. Simple integration totally based on API calls, with no features such as user access control, persistent data (db), monitoring, etc. ([http://code.google.com/p/mconf/issues/detail?id=10 issue 10], [http://code.google.com/p/mconf/issues/detail?id=25 issue 25], [http://code.google.com/p/mconf/issues/detail?id=26 issue 26])

*(Soft) Deadline*: May 20th, 2011.
